mdRecord.dcterms:title: Radford Cemetery, On Silverleaf Rd.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located on Silverleaf Road adjacent to 3490 Silverleaf Rd. on the Floyd /Franklin County Line. N 36 56.308, W 80 11.078 Directions: From Floyd go north on Rt. 221, Right on Franklin Pike, Right on Shooting Creek Rd. to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Turn left and go 4 miles to Cannady's Gap Rd., turn left and make an immediate right onto Silverleaf Road (gravel Road). Go 1.5 miles. The cemetery is on the left on a slight rise, there is a large brick and concrete sign.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
